item.title: Where did I go wrong in adding a item.random?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“kicker862, post:5, topic:384818”][quote author=Zhawa link=topic=480578.msg3518746#msg3518746 date=1299219613]
Did you use my method or remove the bracket? Because its stupid having multiple addItems’ and then having all those ID’s in a list
[/quote]

I used your method but I still got 100 errors so then I removed the bracket and then it worked.[/quote]
Well his basically removed the bracket so o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Where did I go wrong in adding a item.random?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

[quote=“Zhawa, post:2, topic:384818”] if(objectID == 7053){ addItemItem.randomDonator()*8, misc.random(100)); sM("Thank you for donating!"); }

Try it, Cant gaurantee it works
The error is probably the random } above the method :P[/quote]

Lol ty

item.title: Where did I go wrong in adding a item.random?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

} if(objectID == 7053){ addItem(Item.randomDonator(), 2); addItem(13645, misc.random(100)); addItem(13644, misc.random(100)); addItem(13011, misc.random(100)); addItem(13012, misc.random(100)); addItem(13643, misc.random(100)); addItem(13642, misc.random(100)); addItem(13007, misc.random(100)); addItem(13008, misc.random(100)); sM("Thank you for donating!"); }

[code] public static int Donator[] = {13645,13644,13011,13012,13643,13642,13007,13008};

    public static int randomDonator()
    {
        return Donator[(int)(Math.random()*Donator.length)];
    }[/code]

I’m getting 100 errors when I compile.

Read full topic
